languages.text: "Послать мне с вами некого, всех свободных людей я отправил с почтенным техножрецом к губернатору. Я сейчас им воксирую — они вас дождутся. И в штаб сообщу — пусть конвой вам навстречу вышлют! А мы тут по повелению губернатора будем держать оборону!"

"I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"
languages.original_text: "Послать мне с вами некого, всех свободных людей я отправил с почтенным техножрецом к губернатору. Я сейчас им воксирую — они вас дождутся. И в штаб сообщу — пусть конвой вам навстречу вышлют! А мы тут по повелению губернатора будем держать оборону!"

traits.locale_text: "I have no one to send with you as escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to wait for you. And I'll inform the headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

"I have no one to send with you as escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to wait for you. And I'll inform the headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

"I have no one to send with you as escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform the headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

"I have no one to send with you as escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform the headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

"I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

"I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

languages.text: "Ich kann Euch keine Eskorte an die Seite stellen — alle verfügbaren Truppen geleiten schon den ehrenwerten Techpriester zum Gouverneur. Ich befehle ihnen per Vox, auf Euch zu warten. Und ich informiere das Hauptquartier — sie sollen einen Konvoi schicken, der Euch entgegenkommt! Wir befolgen währenddessen die Befehle des Gouverneurs und halten hier die Stellung!"
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann Euch keine Eskorte an die Seite stellen — alle verfügbaren Truppen geleiten schon den ehrenwerten Techpriester zum Gouverneur. Ich befehle ihnen per Vox, auf Euch zu warten. Und ich informiere das Hauptquartier — sie sollen einen Konvoi schicken, der Euch entgegenkommt! Wir befolgen währenddessen die Befehle des Gouverneurs und halten hier die Stellung!"

languages.text: « Du reste, je n'ai personne à vous attribuer comme escorte. J'ai envoyé toutes les troupes disponibles accompagner l'honorable technoprêtre voir le gouverneur. Je les contacterai par transmission-vox pour qu'ils vous attendent et j'informerai le QG, histoire qu'ils vous envoient un convoi pour vous retrouver à mi-chemin. D'ici là, on va suivre les ordres du gouverneur et tenir nos positions ici. »
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: « Du reste, je n'ai personne à vous attribuer comme escorte. J'ai envoyé toutes les troupes disponibles accompagner l'honorable technoprêtre voir le gouverneur. Je les contacterai par transmission-vox pour qu'ils vous attendent et j'informerai le QG, histoire qu'ils vous envoient un convoi pour vous retrouver à mi-chemin. D'ici là, on va suivre les ordres du gouverneur et tenir nos positions ici. »

languages.text: “我暂时抽不出人手来护送您，所有士兵都被派去护送那位尊敬的技术神甫去见总督了。我会用通讯器命令他们等您，我会通知总部，让他们尽快派一支护送队来迎接您！在此期间，我们还是得执行总督的命令，坚守这片区域！”
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: “我暂时抽不出人手来护送您，所有士兵都被派去护送那位尊敬的技术祭司去见总督了。我会用通讯器命令他们等您，我会通知总部，让他们尽快派一支护送队来迎接您！在此期间，我们还是得执行总督的命令，坚守这片区域！”

languages.text: 「護衛として同行させる者がいません。私は、尊敬する技術司祭を総督のもとへお連れするため、使える兵力をすべて割り当ててしまいました。その兵達にあなたをお待ちするように、ヴォクスキャストで命令します。司令部にも伝えますが、あちらから護衛隊を派遣して途中で合流できるようにしたほうがいいでしょう！その間、我々は総督の命令に従い、ここで戦線を維持します！」
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: 「私は、尊敬する技術司祭を総督のもとへお連れするため、使える兵力をすべて割り当てました。その兵達にあなたをお待ちするよううに、ヴォクスキャストで命令します。司令部にも伝えますが、あちらから護衛隊を派遣して途中で合流できるようにしたほうがいいでしょう！その間、我々は総督の命令に従い、ここで戦線を防衛します！」

languages.text: «No tengo a nadie para enviar con usted como escolta, ya que asigné todas las tropas disponibles para acompañar al estimado tecnosacerdote al gobernador. Les daré órdenes por voco para que le esperen. Informaré al cuartel general: ¡más vale que envíen un convoy para encontrarle a mitad de camino! ¡Mientras tanto, seguiremos las órdenes del gobernador y mantendremos la línea aquí!».
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: «No tengo a nadie para enviar con usted como escolta, ya que asigné todas las tropas disponibles para acompañar al estimado tecnosacerdote al gobernador. Les daré órdenes por voco para que le esperen. Informaré al cuartel general: ¡más vale que envíen un convoy para encontrarle a mitad de camino! ¡Mientras tanto, seguiremos las órdenes del gobernador y mantendremos la línea aquí!».

languages.text: "Size refakat edecek adamım kalmadı. Müsait tüm askerleri saygıdeğer Tekno Rahip'e valiye dek eşlik etmeleri için görevlendirdim. Sizi beklemeleri için voksla emir yollayacağım. Karargâha da haber vereceğim ki sizinle orta yolda buluşacak bir konvoy göndersinler! Bu arada biz de valinin emirlerini yerine getirip bu hattı tutacağız!"
languages.original_text: "I have no one to send with you as an escort — I assigned all available troops to accompany the esteemed Tech-Priest to the governor. I will vox-cast orders to them to wait for you. And I'll inform headquarters — they better send out a convoy to meet you halfway! Meanwhile, we will follow the governor's orders and hold the line here!"

traits.locale_text: "Size refakat edecek adamım kalmadı. Müsait tüm askerleri saygıdeğer Tekno Rahip'e valiye dek eşlik etmeleri için görevlendirdim. Sizi beklemeleri için voksla emir yollayacağım. Karargâha da haber vereceğim ki sizinle orta yolda buluşacak bir konvoy göndersinler! Bu arada biz de valinin emirlerini yerine getirip bu hattı tutacağız!"
